casebody.data:
Billy MULKEY and Rochelle Mulkey (Individually and on Behalf of Their Minor Child, Shelly Mulkey), Skylar Mulkey and Justin Mulkey
v.
Burnell ALESSI, Sr., GEICO Casualty Company, State Farm Fire and Casualty Company and State Farm General Insurance Company, Aaron Alessi, Jared Alessi, ABC Insurance Company and Def Insurance Company No. 2017-CC-2161 Supreme Court of Louisiana. February 23, 2018

ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE 19 TH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT FOR THE PARISH OF EAST BATON ROUGE

Writ denied. CRICHTON, J., additionally concurs and assigns reasons: I would deny this writ application on the showing made.
